title: 'Horrified' U.N. official condemns reported killings of civilians in Myanmar
content:
1. 'Horrified' U.N. official condemns reported killings of civilians in Myanmar  Reuters
  2. Reports of Myanmar massacre spark international outrage  CBS News
  3. UN calls for investigation after report of more than 30 massacred by Myanmar military  The Washington Post
  4. 'Horrified' UN official condemns reported killings in Myanmar  CNN
  5. Myanmar massacre sparks outrage, with at least 30 dead and two aid workers still missing  CBS News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: ミャンマーで報告された民間人殺害を「ぞっとするほど」国連職員が非難
